content.en: Fuzzy scheduling optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to efficiently solve different types of scheduling problems in job shops. These algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and hybrid approaches, use concepts like fuzzy processing time and fuzzy due dates to optimize schedules. By incorporating fuzzy decision-making and multi-objective optimization, these algorithms aim to find optimal solutions for complex scheduling problems.
content.da: Fuzzy planlægningsoptimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer til effektivt at løse forskellige typer af planlægningsproblemer i jobshops. Disse algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og hybride tilgange, anvender begreber som fuzzy behandlingstid og fuzzy forfaldsdatoer for at optimere tidsplaner. Ved at integrere fuzzy beslutningstagning og multiobjektiv optimering, sigter disse algoritmer mod at finde optimale løsninger for komplekse planlægningsproblemer.
